title: UNRWA reveals Gaza detainees' trauma, abuse after release by Israel
description: Gazans detained by Israeli forces are coming back "completely traumatized" upon release and reporting abuses while in captivity, the head of the UN's Palestinian refugee agency said.

title: Turkey detains 7 over alleged Mossad links
description: Turkey’s National Intelligence Organization (MIT) and police in Istanbul detained seven suspects for allegedly selling information to Israel’s Mossad intelligence service, Turkey’s Anadolu news agency cited security sources on Tuesday.

title: HRW: Killing of aid seekers part of a ‘decades-long pattern’ of Israeli violence
description: Omar Shakir, Human Right Watch’s director for Israel and Palestine, said attacks by Israeli forces on people seeking aid in Gaza were part of a “decades-long pattern” of deadly abuses against Palestinians.

title: Israel uproots 400 olive seedlings in Palestinian village near Bethlehem
description: Israeli forces have bulldozed agricultural fields and uprooted 400 olive seedlings in the village of Wadi Fukin, west of Bethlehem.

title: Palestinian Canadians sue Foreign Minister Joly over arms exports to Israel
description: Palestinian Canadians and human rights lawyers are suing Foreign Affairs Minister Melanie Joly over exports of military equipment to Israel, which they argue violate Canada’s obligations under domestic and international law.

title: Hezbollah strikes Israeli forces
description: Lebanon’s Hezbollah said Tuesday that it had struck Israeli soldiers near the border with southern Lebanon.

title: Iran censures sanctions as ‘crimes against humanity’
description: TEHRAN- Iran’s top human rights official has condemned countries that use sanctions to fulfill political goals, saying such states must be held accountable for their “crimes against humanity”.

title: Social media platforms block Iran’s Al-Alam accounts over coverage of Gaza war
description: TEHRAN- In a new attack against freedom of expression, a number of American social media platforms have blocked the accounts of the Iranian Arabic-language news network Al-Alam without prior notice.

title: 20mm Oerlikon Cannons among Iran arms showcased at Qatar defense expo
description: TEHRAN – Iran has showcased several domestically developed and produced weapons displayed at the Doha International Maritime Defense Exhibition and Conference (DIMDEX 2024).

title: UN Security Council giving greenlight to more Israeli crimes:  Iran envoy
description: TEHRAN- Iran’s Ambassador and Permanent Representative to the United Nations has vehemently slammed the U.S. for throwing its way behind the Israeli regime and blocking calls for a ceasefire in Gaza.

title: Only 25% of international aid reaches Gaza: IRCS
description: TEHRAN – The president of the Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) has warned that Israel’s continued obstruction of aid into Gaza is poised to create a devastating humanitarian disaster in the enclave.

title: BRICS initial agreement with Iran's proposals
description: TEHRAN - In a commentary, Kayhan addressed the proposals of the Central Bank of Iran to create alternative mechanisms to SWIFT and FATF.

title: March 1 polls fueled by patriotism and political awareness: speaker
description: TEHRAN- The speaker of Iran's Parliament emphasizes the significance of engagement in Friday's elections, noting an increase in participation driven by patriotism, civic interest, national security concerns, and political awareness despite perceived external challenges.

title: 45 parliamentary seats will be decided in run-off election
description: TEHRAN - In an interview with reporters on Monday, Mohsen Eslami, the spokesperson for the election headquarters, provided details on the parliamentary and Assembly of Experts elections held on March 1.

title: Israel aims to weaken Palestinian resistance to occupation: diplomat
description: TEHRAN- Ali Bahreini, Iran’s ambassador and permanent representative to the Geneva-based international organizations, has noted that Tehran is extremely concerned about Israel’s plans to purposefully damage humanitarian infrastructure in order to undermine the Palestinian people’s ability to withstand the regime’s occupation.

title: Ayatollah Khamenei  plants olive tree in solidarity with Palestinians
description: TEHRAN - On the occasion of Iran’s National Tree Planting Day, Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei planted three tree saplings including an olive one to mark the unyielding resistance of the Palestinian nation against the Zionist regime.

title: Yemen hits Israeli vessel, U.S. warships
description: The spokesperson for the Sanaa government’s armed forces has announced that Ansarullah has carried out more operations in support of Gaza, targeting an Israeli container ship and U.S. warships.

title: American plan for Gaza reconstruction: A final attempt to discipline Palestinians
description: MADRID - The aim of this article is to analyze the U.S. plan for the "reconstruction of Gaza," a plan conceived by many of the same individuals who designed the U.S. invasion of Iraq over 20 years ago.

title: Tehran calls on Islamic nations to intensify efforts against Israel
description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Foreign Minister on Tuesday said Muslim countries should take more decisive and concrete steps to pressure Israel to cease its genocidal attacks on Palestinians in the besieged Gaza Strip.

title: Iran, Pakistan leaders hold phone call with pledges of deepening cooperation
description: TEHRAN – Iranian president Ebrahim Raisi has conveyed Iran's eagerness to significantly enhance comprehensive relations with Pakistan in a phone conversation with the country’s recently elected Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif.

title: Smokescreen for battlefield failure
description: TEHRAN- More than 150 days have passed since Israel launched its genocidal war on the Gaza Strip which has claimed the lives of nearly 31,000 people and left tens of thousands of others injured.

title: Iranian shorts on screen at U.S. festival
description: TEHRAN- Two Iranian short films are on screen at the 33rd edition of Cinequest Film & VR Festival (CQFF), which is currently underway in San Jose, the U.S.

title: Renowned ney player Jamshid Andalibi passes away at 66
description: TEHRAN-Renowned Iranian ney player Jamshid Andalibi passed away on Tuesday, March 5, due to cardiac arrest.

title: Book on indigenous Iranian architecture unveiled in Tehran
description: TEHRAN- "In Search of Urban Etiquette," a book on the indigenous Yazd style of Iranian architecture was unveiled during a ceremony at the Iranian Academy of Arts in Tehran on Monday.

title: Veteran actor Ali Nassirian to be commemorated
description: TEHRAN-The veteran actor Ali Nassirian will be commemorated in a ceremony on Thursday at the gallery of Mellat Cineplex in Tehran, where a book written about him will also be unveiled.

title: Reza Sadeghi sings for child laborers
description: TEHRAN-Celebrated Iranian pop singer Reza Sadeghi held a free concert for child laborers at Tehran’s Milad Tower International Conference Center on Monday night.

title: Masuleh possible UNESCO label: assessors investigating capacities
description: TEHRAN – As a momentous step, an expert team from the International Council on Monuments and Sites (ICOMOS) has arrived in Masuleh to assess the historical and cultural potential of the ancient village for possible UNESCO registration.

title: Sistan-Baluchestan gears up for Nowruz travels
description: TEHRAN- As preparations unfold for the Nowruz (Persian New Year) holidays countrywide, Sistan-Baluchestan seeks to host travelers in the best possible.

title: 37 historical forts in southeast Iran damaged by heavy rainfall
description: TEHRAN - Heavy rainfall in Iran’s Sistan-Baluchestan province has caused significant damage to 37 historical fortresses and structures, according to a tourism official.

title: Sacred Defense: Khuzestan top destination for war tourism
description: TEHRAN – Khuzestan province is a top destination for war tourism. It is home to 41 national-registered sites and elements concerning the 1980-88 Iran-Iraq war (known in the Islamic Republic as Sacred Defense).

title: Modern Iran home to 19,000 archaeological hills, tourism minister says
description: TEHRAN – Iran’s tourism minister, addressing the 21st Symposium of Iranian Archaeology held at the National Museum of Iran, underscored the nation's rich cultural heritage, citing approximately 19,000 historical hills that are scattered across the country.

title: China’s top legislative body’s opening meeting held
description: Beijing- The opening meeting of the second session of the 14th National People's Congress (NPC) of China was held at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on Tuesday.

title: TEDPIX gains 32,000 points on Tuesday
description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), rose 32,061 points (1.5 percent) to 2,172,226 on Tuesday, which is the fourth day of the Iranian calendar week.

title: Iran negotiating with Syria, Iraq on joint free zone
description: TEHRAN - The Secretary of the Iranian Free Zones High Council has said the country is negotiating with Syria and Iraq for the establishment of a trilateral joint free zone, IRNA reported.

title: Iran negotiating with Syria, Iraq on joint free zones
description: TEHRAN - The Secretary of the Iranian Free Zones High Council has said the country is negotiating with Syria and Iraq for the establishment of a trilateral joint free zone, IRNA reported.

title: Iron ore reserves stand at 3.8 billion tons
description: TEHRAN - The head of the Geological Survey and Mineral Exploration of Iran (GSI) has said the country’s iron ore reserves currently stand at 3.8 billion tons, adding that the figure can increase with new exploration.

title: Iran to expand electricity exchange with neighbors
description: TEHRAN - Iranian Energy Minister Ali-Akbar Mehrabian has said the country has prepared the necessary ground to exchange electricity with the neighboring states such as Uzbekistan, Tajikistan, and Turkmenistan.

title: Oil sector’s nine-month growth surges 292%
description: TEHRAN - Iran’s oil sector achieved significant growth in the first nine months of the current Irani

title: Unilateral claim on Arash gas field creates no rights for claimant, Iran says
description: TEHRAN - Iran’s Foreign Ministry spokesman said on Monday that unilateral claims on the joint Arash gas field in the Persian Gulf will not create any rights for the claimant.

title: Steel products worth $7 billion exported in 11 months
description: TEHRAN - Iran exported about 27 million tons of steel products worth $7.0 billion in the first 11 months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 21, 2023-February 19, 2024), according to the Iranian Steel Producers Association (ISPA).

title: Iranian, Russian firms sign MOUs to co-op in new construction technologies
description: TEHRAN – Knowledge-based companies from Iran and Russia inked two memorandums of understanding (MOUs) to cooperate in the field of new construction technologies.

title: National Tree Planting Day marked
description: TEHRAN –National Tree Planting Day was held on Tuesday by planting saplings across the country.

title: Time to recognize women’s critical role in agriculture – and invest in it!
description: Despite women's significant contributions to our agrifood systems in the Asia-Pacific region, women continue to face persistent obstacles, including limited access to resources, services, and discriminatory practices all along the food value chain. As we gather to celebrate this year’s International Women's Day (IWD), it is time for action, to fully recognize women's indispensable role in the fields, in the factories, and those running small and medium-sized companies, associations and cooperatives – all of which produce the nutritious food we eat each day.

title: Tehran, Algiers to boost technology, innovation co-op
description: TEHRAN – Iran and Algeria have signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) to enhance cooperation in areas related to innovation and technology.

title: Nationwide ‘feast of charity’ begins
description: TEHRAN – Jashn-e Nikoukari (feast of charity), a campaign that is held each year to help financially struggling families address their essential needs, kicked off across the country on Monday.

title: The Assembly of Experts: Key Role in the Constitutional Framework of the Islamic Republic
description: TEHRAN - Millions of Iranians went to the polls on March 1 to elect 290 lawmakers and 88 members of the Assembly of Experts, the body responsible, according to the Iranian constitution itself, for “electing and overseeing” the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.

title: Clubs' ownership jeopardizes future of Persepolis and Esteghlal
description: TEHRAN - Clubs' ownership dispute threatens Iranian giants Persepolis and Esteghal's AFC Champions League’s participation.

title: Mahsa Ghorbani to become first Iranian woman referee for men’s competition
description: TEHRAN – Mahsa Ghorbani has been appointed as one of three video assistant referee (VAR) officials in the match between Persepolis and Esteghlal in Tehran derby, Khodadad Afsharian, head of Iran football league referees’ committee, announced that.

title: Iran water polo too strong for Sri Lanka at Asian Age Group Championship
description: TEHRAN – Iran water polo team beat Sri Lanka 34-0 on Tuesday at the 11th Asian Age Group Championship.
